sentence.Network_en: He is quite without principle, ie behaves immorally.
sentence.Network_cn: 他完全没有道德观念(做的事不道德).

sentence.Network_en: He acted immorally when his own interests were at stake.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他自己的利益受到威胁的时候,他的行动就不合乎道德了.
